name: Godly Corp
description: An intern in an intergalactic corporation managing the universe. Use your tentacle to perform unusual office tasks and try to not destroy all life on the planets you look after. Every day brings completely new challenges. Expect everything - chainsaw robots, bug infestation, space trips and more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 7800 GT or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX9.0 compatible sound card Additional Notes: Keyboard + mouse with scroll
